gambler:Showdown.NAME: Showdown
gambler:Showdown.DESCRIPTION: It's time to show your gambler:Hand.

gambler:RedJoker.NAME: Red Joker
gambler:RedJoker.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Can be any card in a gambler:Hand.

gambler:BlackJoker.NAME: Black Joker
gambler:BlackJoker.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Can be any card in a gambler:Hand.

gambler:H2.NAME: 2 of Hearts
gambler:H2.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL gambler:Showdown: Apply (1/2) Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

gambler:D2.NAME: 2 of Diamonds
gambler:D2.DESCRIPTION: Costs !GMB_GC! Gold. NL Put a card from your discard pile into your hand. NL gambler:Showdown: Apply (1/2) Weak to ALL enemies.

gambler:C2.NAME: 2 of Clubs
gambler:C2.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL gambler:Showdown: Apply (1/2) Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

gambler:S2.NAME: 2 of Spades
gambler:S2.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Draw 1 card. NL gambler:Showdown: Apply (1/2) Weak to ALL enemies.

gambler:H3.NAME: 3 of Hearts
gambler:H3.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! gambler:Ante. NL gambler:Showdown: Apply (1/2) Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

gambler:D3.NAME: 3 of Diamonds
gambler:D3.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! cards. NL gambler:Showdown: Apply (1/2) Weak to ALL enemies.

gambler:C3.NAME: 3 of Clubs
gambler:C3.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Whenever you are attacked this turn, apply !M! gambler:Ante back. NL gambler:Showdown: Apply (1/2) Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

gambler:S3.NAME: 3 of Spades
gambler:S3.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage. NL gambler:Showdown: Gain (1/2) Strength.

gambler:H4.NAME: 4 of Hearts
gambler:H4.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL gambler:Showdown: Apply (1/2) Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

gambler:D4.NAME: 4 of Diamonds
gambler:D4.DESCRIPTION: Costs !GMB_GC! Gold. NL Deal !D! damage. NL gambler:Showdown: Apply (1/2) Weak to ALL enemies.

gambler:C4.NAME: 4 of Clubs
gambler:C4.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! gambler:Ante. NL gambler:Showdown: Apply (1/2) Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

gambler:S4.NAME: 4 of Spades
gambler:S4.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Draw cards equal to your [E]. NL gambler:Showdown: Apply (1/2) Weak to ALL enemies.

gambler:H5.NAME: 5 of Hearts
gambler:H5.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage X times. NL gambler:Showdown: Apply (1/2) Vulnerable to ALL enemies.
gambler:H5.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage X+1 times. NL gambler:Showdown: Apply (1/2) Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

gambler:D5.NAME: 5 of Diamonds
gambler:D5.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Gold. NL gambler:Showdown: Apply (1/2) Weak to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

gambler:C5.NAME: 5 of Clubs
gambler:C5.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! gambler:Ante to a random enemy twice. NL gambler:Showdown: Apply (1/2) Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

gambler:S5.NAME: 5 of Spades
gambler:S5.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL gambler:Showdown: Gain (1/2) Strength.

gambler:H6.NAME: 6 of Hearts
gambler:H6.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL gambler:Showdown: Apply (1/2) Weak and Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

gambler:D6.NAME: 6 of Diamonds
gambler:D6.DESCRIPTION: Costs !GMB_GC! Gold. NL Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL gambler:Showdown: Apply (1/2) Weak and Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

gambler:C6.NAME: 6 of Clubs
gambler:C6.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL gambler:Showdown: Apply (1/2) Weak and Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

gambler:S6.NAME: 6 of Spades
gambler:S6.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards and reduce their cost by 1 this turn. NL gambler:Showdown: Apply (1/2) Weak and Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

gambler:H7.NAME: 7 of Hearts
gambler:H7.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply gambler:Ante equal to unblocked damage dealt. NL gambler:Showdown: Gain (1/2) Strength.

gambler:D7.NAME: 7 of Diamonds
gambler:D7.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies !M! times. NL gambler:Showdown: Gain (1/2) Strength.

gambler:C7.NAME: 7 of Clubs
gambler:C7.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! gambler:Ante to ALL enemies. NL gambler:Showdown: Gain (1/2) Dexterity.

gambler:S7.NAME: 7 of Spades
gambler:S7.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block for each Skill played this turn. NL gambler:Showdown: Gain (1/2) Dexterity.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block for each Skill played this turn. NL (
Skill played.) NL gambler:Showdown: Gain (1/2) Dexterity.
Skills played.) NL gambler:Showdown: Gain (1/2) Dexterity.

gambler:H8.NAME: 8 of Hearts
gambler:H8.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Retain your hand this turn. NL gambler:Showdown: Gain (1/2) Strength.

gambler:D8.NAME: 8 of Diamonds
gambler:D8.DESCRIPTION: Costs !GMB_GC! Gold. NL Deal !D! damage to a random enemy twice. NL gambler:Showdown: Gain (1/2) Strength.

gambler:C8.NAME: 8 of Clubs
gambler:C8.DESCRIPTION: Double the enemy's gambler:Ante. NL gambler:Showdown: Gain (1/2) Dexterity.
gambler:C8.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Triple the enemy's gambler:Ante. NL gambler:Showdown: Gain (1/2) Dexterity.

gambler:S8.NAME: 8 of Spades
gambler:S8.DESCRIPTION: Next turn, draw !M! additional cards. NL gambler:Showdown: Gain (1/2) Dexterity.

gambler:H9.NAME: 9 of Hearts
gambler:H9.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals twice as much if the enemy has Block. NL gambler:Showdown: Gain 5 Gold.

gambler:D9.NAME: 9 of Diamonds
gambler:D9.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Put a card from your draw pile into your gambler:Hand. NL gambler:Showdown: Gain 5 Gold.

gambler:C9.NAME: 9 of Clubs
gambler:C9.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals additional damage equal to the enemy's gambler:Ante. NL gambler:Showdown: Gain 5 Gold.

gambler:S9.NAME: 9 of Spades
gambler:S9.DESCRIPTION: Draw a card. NL gambler:Showdown: Gain 5 Gold. NL Exhaust.
gambler:S9.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL gambler:Showdown: Gain 5 Gold. NL Exhaust.

gambler:H10.NAME: 10 of Hearts
gambler:H10.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength when you play your gambler:Hand while it costs 0. NL gambler:Showdown: Gain (1/2) Strength.
gambler:H10.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Gain !M! Strength when you play your gambler:Hand while it costs 0. NL gambler:Showdown: Gain (1/2) Strength.

gambler:D10.NAME: 10 of Diamonds
gambler:D10.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, change the suit of up to 1 card in your gambler:Hand. NL gambler:Showdown: Gain 5 Gold.
gambler:D10.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, change the suit of up to 1 card in your gambler:Hand. NL gambler:Showdown: Gain 10 Gold.

gambler:C10.NAME: 10 of Clubs
gambler:C10.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you apply gambler:Ante, apply !M! more. NL gambler:Showdown: Apply 3 gambler:Ante to ALL enemies.

gambler:S10.NAME: 10 of Spades
gambler:S10.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, change the value of up to 1 card in your gambler:Hand. NL gambler:Showdown: Gain (1/2) Dexterity.

gambler:H11.NAME: Jack of Hearts
gambler:H11.DESCRIPTION: Costs !GMB_GC! Gold. NL Whenever you gain or lose Gold, gain !M! Block. NL gambler:Showdown: Gain 5 Gold.

gambler:D11.NAME: Jack of Diamonds
gambler:D11.DESCRIPTION: Costs !GMB_GC! Gold. NL Cards cost 50% less Gold to play. NL gambler:Showdown: Gain 5 Gold.

gambler:C11.NAME: Jack of Clubs
gambler:C11.DESCRIPTION: Costs !GMB_GC! Gold. NL Gain !B! Block. NL gambler:Showdown: Gain 5 Gold.

gambler:S11.NAME: Jack of Spades
gambler:S11.DESCRIPTION: Costs !GMB_GC! Gold. NL Gain 1 Intangible. NL gambler:Showdown: Gain 5 Gold.

gambler:H12.NAME: Queen of Hearts
gambler:H12.DESCRIPTION: Costs !GMB_GC! Gold. NL Deal damage equal to X/15 of your Gold to ALL enemies. NL gambler:Showdown: Gain [E].
gambler:H12.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Costs !GMB_GC! Gold. NL Deal damage equal to X/12 of your Gold to ALL enemies. NL gambler:Showdown: Gain [E].
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Costs !GMB_GC! Gold. NL Deal damage equal to X/15 of your Gold to ALL enemies. NL (Deals !D! damage.) NL gambler:Showdown: Gain [E].
Costs !GMB_GC! Gold. NL Deal damage equal to X/12 of your Gold to ALL enemies. NL (Deals !D! damage.) NL gambler:Showdown: Gain [E].

gambler:D12.NAME: Queen of Diamonds
gambler:D12.DESCRIPTION: Gain X Gold at the start of your next !M! turns. NL gambler:Showdown: Gain [E]. NL Exhaust.

gambler:C12.NAME: Queen of Clubs
gambler:C12.DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to X/20 of your Gold. NL gambler:Showdown: Gain [E].
gambler:C12.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to X/16 of your Gold. NL gambler:Showdown: Gain [E].
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to X/20 of your Gold. NL (Gain !B! Block.) NL gambler:Showdown: Gain [E].
Gain Block equal to X/16 of your Gold. NL (Gain !B! Block.) NL gambler:Showdown: Gain [E].

gambler:S12.NAME: Queen of Spades
gambler:S12.DESCRIPTION: Add a copy of this card to your next X gambler:Hands. NL gambler:Showdown: Gain [E]. NL Exhaust.
gambler:S12.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add a copy of this card to your next X+1 gambler:Hands. NL gambler:Showdown: Gain [E]. NL Exhaust.

gambler:H13.NAME: King of Hearts
gambler:H13.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to the enemy's Ante X times. NL gambler:Showdown: Gain (1/2) Strength.
gambler:H13.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to the enemy's Ante X+1 times. NL gambler:Showdown: Gain (1/2) Strength.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: (Deal !D! damage X times.) NL Deal damage equal to the enemy's Ante X times. NL gambler:Showdown: Gain (1/2) Strength.
(Deal !D! damage X+1 times.) NL Deal damage equal to the enemy's Ante X+1 times. NL gambler:Showdown: Gain (1/2) Strength.

gambler:D13.NAME: King of Diamonds
gambler:D13.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If Fatal, gain Gold equal to the gambler:Hand's damage.

gambler:C13.NAME: King of Clubs
gambler:C13.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E] for each enemy with gambler:Ante. NL gambler:Showdown: Gain (1/2) Dexterity. NL Exhaust.

gambler:H1.NAME: Ace of Hearts
gambler:H1.DESCRIPTION: The effects of your cost X cards are increased by X.
gambler:H1.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: The effects of your cost X cards are increased by X+1.

gambler:D1.NAME: Ace of Diamonds
gambler:D1.DESCRIPTION: Costs !GMB_GC! Gold. NL Choose one: Gain !D! Strength, !B! Dexterity, or heal !M! HP.

gambler:C1.NAME: Ace of Clubs
gambler:C1.DESCRIPTION: Your gambler:Hand requires !M! less card to cost 0.
gambler:C1.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Your gambler:Hand requires !M! less cards to cost 0.

gambler:S1.NAME: Ace of Spades
gambler:S1.DESCRIPTION: gambler:Showdown: Deals twice as much damage.

gambler:LotteryTicket.NAME: Lottery Ticket
gambler:LotteryTicket.DESCRIPTION: Gain an X/12 chance for a random relic reward at the end of combat.
gambler:LotteryTicket.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain an X/10 chance for a random relic reward at the end of combat.

gambler:CopyMachine.NAME: Copy Machine
gambler:CopyMachine.DESCRIPTION: Choose up to !M! cards in your deck. NL Add a copy of each to your draw pile. NL Exhaust.
